name: FakeValuesTest
description: Unit tests for the FakeValues class, focusing on various scenarios related to locale and path handling.

test_cases.name: getAValueReturnsAValue
test_cases.description: Tests if the get method returns a non-null value for a valid path.

test_cases.name: getAValueDoesNotReturnAValue
test_cases.description: Tests if the get method returns null for an invalid path.

test_cases.name: getAValueWithANonEnglishFile
test_cases.description: Tests if the get method returns a non-null value for a non-English locale.

test_cases.name: getAValueForHebrewLocale
test_cases.description: Tests if the get method returns a non-null value for a Hebrew locale.

test_cases.name: correctPathForHebrewLanguage
test_cases.description: Tests if the getPaths method returns the correct path for a Hebrew locale.

test_cases.name: incorrectPathForHebrewLanguage
test_cases.description: Tests if the getPaths method does not return an incorrect path for a Hebrew locale.

test_cases.name: correctLocale
test_cases.description: Tests if the getLocale method returns the correct locale.

test_cases.name: getAValueFromALocaleThatCantBeLoaded
test_cases.description: Tests if the get method returns null for a locale that cannot be loaded.

test_cases.name: checkEquals
test_cases.description: Tests the equality of FakeValues instances based on different contexts.
